meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a lemur.
meanings.sent1: The lemurs in the zoo have a lemurine appearance.
meanings.sent2: The lemurine markings on the animal's fur were striking.
meanings.sent3: The lemurine antics of the mischievous child entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her lemurine agility on the dance floor was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with the lemurine calls of the playful creatures.

meanings.sent1: The lemurs' lemurine behavior fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The lemurine habitat was carefully recreated in the sanctuary.
meanings.sent3: The lemurine party decorations added a wild touch to the event.
meanings.sent4: Her lemurine instincts kicked in when she heard a rustling in the bushes.
meanings.sent5: The lemurine exhibit at the museum showcased the diversity of the species.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics of a lemur.
meanings.sent1: The child's lemurine curiosity led him to explore every corner of the garden.
meanings.sent2: The lemurine eyes of the portrait seemed to follow you wherever you went.
meanings.sent3: The lemurine playfulness of the puppy brought joy to the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her lemurine agility on the soccer field made her a star player.
meanings.sent5: The lemurine charm of the small creature captured everyone's hearts.
